title: BRIEF-Primoris Services Announces ‍Extension Of Master Services Agreement With Anticipated Value Of $40 Mln
text: March 22, 2018 / 12:08 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Primoris Services Announces ‍Extension Of Master Services Agreement With Anticipated Value Of $40 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 22 (Reuters) - Primoris Services Corp: * PRIMORIS SERVICES CORP - ‍EXTENSION OF A MASTER SERVICES AGREEMENT WITH AN ANTICIPATED VALUE OF $40 MILLION​ * PRIMORIS SERVICES CORP - ‍CONTRACT WAS SECURED BY ARB UNDERGROUND, PART OF UTILITIES & DISTRIBUTION SEGMENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
